basic.description: This internship in an approved organization provides practical experience in a number of fields, in which the student may apply interdisciplinary knowledge of the region and specific disciplinary training.
basic.subject: LAS
basic.title: Internship in Latin American and Caribbean Studies

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Completion of sixty semester hours, completion of fifteen semester hours in LACS, an overall or LACS GPA of 3.0, advisor permission one semester in advance.
